data.why:
CGI::ValidOp (tentative name) Aim: the simplest possible way to
    correctly validate CGI parameters. Usage: - Feed a tree (hash) of
    permitted operations and all their parameters (including how they're
    too be validated) into a constructor. - Get back an object
    containing the current op (i.e. runmode) and all parameters,
    validated and correctly untainted, along with any errors messages
    generated by the process.
